title: Samuel Kostman Testimony - Hebrew Translation
description: Hebrew translation of Samuel Kostman's testimony, prepared by Yad Vashem. Original testimony recorded in Polish on April 14-15, 1960. Kostman recounts his experiences as a Jewish resistance fighter in Borysław before WWII, his 10-year prison sentence for defending Jews against antisemitic attacks, his escape during the 1939 evacuation, service in the Red Army, and post-war life in Poland before emigrating to Israel in 1958.
